body_html:
Is this issue still worked on? With a recent build of TF ( 57ff9d9be2f1faaba9598a3d99ef6c3af02342a4), I still get an "empty" step_stats object in a distributed environment. When written to JSON it looks like this:
{
"traceEvents": [
{
"ph": "M",
"args": {
"name": "Allocators"
},
"pid": 0,
"name": "process_name"
}
]
}

It would be great if it were possible to profile in the distributed environment. Thx!
